response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $1,000,000 to you. We understand the importance of this investment for you, and we are confident it will bring significant value to your endeavors. Our offer for this exceptional product is $950,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price, allowing you to maximize your returns. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
